pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 18, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Queen’s Entrance
Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery and are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office in advance. Media will have access to the Rideau Hall grounds as of 6:00 a.m.
    • Media contact:
      Marie-Ève Létourneau
      Rideau Hall Press Office
      613-998-0287
      613-302-0912 (cell)
      marie-eve.letourneau@gg.ca
